Name: Rafique Mohammed
AboutMe:
Einstein (probably) said: Two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I am not yet completely sure about the universe.

After spending some time, reading the questions, here on StackOverflow, I have to admit that, at least about humans, he was right.

I'm good in downvoting your questions. I downvote questions like:

  • NullPointerException in own code(for FSM sake! use debugger!)
  • NetworkOnMainThreadException(search first ask later, bcz my first question ever in stackoverflow is abt this :-P)
  • JSON parsing on Android(search first ask later)
  • Unfortunately the process xx.xxxxx.xxx has stopped without posting logcat log(i'm sure that SO users doesn't use magic orbs)
  • "I want develop application like xxxxx"
